description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Satay Tofu Skewers With Thai Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Jan Feb 2020,Tofu,Dairy free
name: BBQ Satay Tofu Skewers With Thai Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red capsicums, deseeded (cut into large chunks)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue or chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Thread tofu, capsicum and zucchini pieces onto 8 skewers.
Cook skewers for 67 minutes, turning, or until charred on all sides.
In a large bowl, toss the salad together with the dressing from the kit.
Divide salad between plates and top with skewers. Scatter over crispy shallots from the kit.
